details.reference: Reference to the list of provisionally selected Gramin Dak Sevak from Department of Post as Executives on engagement basis released on 12.11.2024
details.regarding: provisionally selected Gramin Dak Sevak for onboarding in phase- II

name: IPPB/CO/HR/RECT./2024-25 Extension of last date of online submission of applications with fee

details.author: Preeti Kumari, Assistant General Manager HR Department
details.organization: India Post Payments Bank Limited, CIN : U74999DL2016G0130451
details.contact_info: Post Office, Speed Post Center Building, Tel. : +011-23362 147

details.reference: Reference to the subject noted matter, it is informed that as per Clause 4 of the recruitment notification, next list of 141 candidates has been drawn location wise based on the percentage of graduation mentioned in the online application with preference to candidates having MBA- Sales/ Marketing and a total of 141 candidates are invited for document verification which is scheduled on 09.07.2024, 10.07.2024 and 11.07.2024 at IPPB Corporate Office, New Delhi for further process.
details.documents_required: Candidates are required to produce original certificates of educational qualifications, age proof and other supporting documents.

details.Social Distancing Instructions: Candidate is required to report at the exam venue strictly as per the time slot mentioned in the Call Letter. Latecomers will not be allowed to take the test.
details.Exam Venue Rules: No other Items are permitted inside the venue. Candidate should not share any of their personal belonging/material with anyone.
